properties.address: The Parish Council Community Centre, West Yorkshire WF7 7JH
properties.description: We are a Community Library and a Community Social Hub. We welcome everyone members and non members. We have a suite of 4 computers for public use and have public wifi. For a small cost we supply hot and cold drinks , biscuits and occasionally cake. We were part of the WMDC warm Space project which we received funding for, we will not be receiving funding from WMDC again this year but would still like to provide a warm space but being a charity cannot afford to do this free of charge to the public without funding.
properties.title: Ackworth Community Library

properties.address: Snack and Chat Airedale Library, West Yorkshire WF10 3JJ
properties.description: We run a day session with free refreshments, games, crafts, and hobbies. with this we do offer a 2 course meal for £5.00 if wish to book in. We are looking at a light lunch (soup and a roll ) for £2.50.
properties.title: Airedale fun, friends and laughter

properties.address: Doncaster Metropolitan Borough Council, South Yorkshire DN6 0JA
properties.description: The space is open to all
properties.title: Askern Community Hub

properties.address: Featherstone Community Centre, West Yorkshire WF7 5BB
properties.description: A lunch group that we already run will be available to attend for free refreshments. Games and quizzes available to join in with. Meals can be booked at a charge £5.00 for 2 courses. soup and roll £2.50.
properties.title: Featherstone foodies

properties.address: Kinsley & Fitzwilliam Learning & Community Centre, West Yorkshire WF9 5BP

properties.title: Fitzwilliam Centre

properties.description: Open Every Thursday, 10.00am - 1.30pm offering FREE refreshments throughout with lunch at 12.30pm. All are invited to and optional ‘pause for thought’ at 12 noon.
